exceptions.exn: In environment b : nat Hb : (2 <= b)%nat k : nat Hk : k <> 0%nat Hak : alpha_nat b k <> 0%nat ak2 := (alpha_nat b k * alpha_nat b k)%nat : nat Hak2 : ak2 <> 0%nat m, l : nat Hm : m = (l * k)%nat Hl : l <> 0%nat Z2Zp_morph := Z2Zp_morphishm Hak2 : ring_morphism 0 1 Z.add Z.mul Z.opp (Zp_zero Hak2) (Zp_one Hak2) (Zp_plus Hak2) (Zp_mult Hak2) (Zp_opp Hak2) (Z2Zp Hak2) H : forall (p : nat) (Hp : p <> 0%nat) (x : Z_Zp p), Zp_plus Hp x (Zp_opp Hp x) = Zp_zero Hp Unable to unify "Zp_plus ?M1518 ?M1519 (Zp_opp ?M1518 ?M1519) = Zp_zero ?M1518" with "monoid_theory Z.mul 1".
